buildCommand: cd ../.. && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_SENTRY_DSN='' SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_INIT=true SENTRY_SKIP_BINARY_DOWNLOAD=true bun install && cd apps/web && bun run build
installCommand: cd ../.. && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_SENTRY_DSN='' SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_INIT=true SENTRY_SKIP_BINARY_DOWNLOAD=true bun install
